WorldBending.name: WorldBending
WorldBending.special_text: Shuffle a copy of your hand into your deck

Sprint.name: Sprint
Sprint.special_text: Discard a card to gain 1 mana

Turncoat.name: Turncoat
Turncoat.special_text: When this dies, your opponent draws a card

FlameWall.name: FlameWall
FlameWall.special_text: At the start of your turn, deal 1 damage to adjacent enemies

ShieldWall.name: ShieldWall
ShieldWall.special_text: When a friendly minion takes spell damage, this takes it instead.

Swordmaker.name: Swordmaker
Swordmaker.special_text: When you play a minion, give it +1 attack

Forge.name: Forge
Forge.special_text: When you play a minion, give it +1 defense

Cobra.name: Cobra
Cobra.special_text: Destroy any minion damaged by this minion

BuilderAnt.name: BuilderAnt
BuilderAnt.special_text: Choose a minion.  Add 2 copies of it to your deck.

Eagle Eye Raven.name: Eagle Eye Raven
Eagle Eye Raven.special_text: Flying. Enter: Reveal a card in your opponent's hand

Smuggler.name: Smuggler
Smuggler.special_text: When this dies, draw a card

Apprentice.name: Apprentice
Apprentice.special_text: When this minion takes damage, draw a card

PalmStrike.name: PalmStrike
PalmStrike.special_text: Make a Bonus Attack.  Costs 1 more for each Item you control.

FireElemental.name: FireElemental
FireElemental.special_text: At the start of your turn, deal 1 damage to adjacent enemies

LightningRod.name: LightningRod
LightningRod.special_text: When a friendly minion takes spell damage, this takes it instead.

LuckyCoin.name: LuckyCoin
LuckyCoin.special_text: Gain 2 mana this turn.  This is always in your starting hand.

Embargo.name: Embargo
Embargo.special_text: Put an Embargo on top of your opponent's deck

Tariff.name: Tariff
Tariff.special_text: Put a Tariff on top of your opponent's deck. Draw a card

TradeWar.name: TradeWar
TradeWar.special_text: Put two Trade Wars on top of your opponent's deck

Practice.name: Practice
Practice.special_text: Next time you play a spell, Repeat its effect.

Novice Shieldmaster.name: Novice Shieldmaster
Novice Shieldmaster.special_text: When your opponent casts a spell, ignore its effect and destroy this minion

Sunmaker.name: Sunmaker
Sunmaker.special_text: Enter: Give spells in your deck -1 cost

MammothHunter.name: MammothHunter
MammothHunter.special_text: Charge.  Takes no damage this turn

Seedling.name: Seedling
Seedling.special_text: Transform into a 1/1 copy of a minion.

Fireworks.name: Fireworks
Fireworks.special_text: Deal 2 damage.  Add a Fireworks to your deck.

FranticScholar.name: FranticScholar
FranticScholar.special_text: Discard a card, then draw a card

ArcaneScribe.name: ArcaneScribe
ArcaneScribe.special_text: When you play a card, add a copy of it to your deck

TreasureHunter.name: TreasureHunter
TreasureHunter.special_text: When this attacks, add a Treasure to your hand

Muk.name: Muk
Muk.special_text: When this minion takes damage, summon a 1/1 Blob

BookBurner.name: BookBurner
BookBurner.special_text: When you discard a card, deal 1 damage to your opponent.

War Elephant.name: War Elephant
War Elephant.special_text: When this minion takes damage, reduce it by one

Spray.name: Spray
Spray.special_text: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions

SwiftCaravel.name: SwiftCaravel
SwiftCaravel.special_text: Put a Blockade on your opponent's deck

Overwhelm.name: Overwhelm
Overwhelm.special_text: Destroy a minion.  Discard a card.

Strange Traveler.name: Strange Traveler
Strange Traveler.special_text: Transform a minion into a Strange Traveler

FireShaman.name: FireShaman
FireShaman.special_text: When you draw a card, deal 1 damage to all other minions

Flame.name: Flame
Flame.special_text: Deal 4 damage to all enemy minions

Shards.name: Shards
Shards.special_text: Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions

First Light.name: First Light
First Light.special_text: Give cards in your hand -1 cost

Kraken.name: Kraken
Kraken.special_text: Enter: Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions

StaticArc.name: StaticArc
StaticArc.special_text: Pay 1: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy

Adaptation.name: Adaptation
Adaptation.special_text: When you play a card, add a copy of it to your deck

Sentry.name: Sentry
Sentry.special_text: At the start of the game, summon this minion

CarrionFlies.name: CarrionFlies
CarrionFlies.special_text: When a friendly minion dies, summon this from your deck.

Lunge.name: Lunge
Lunge.special_text: Pay 1: Gain 1 attack until the end of your turn
